title.value: AI content detection in the emerging information ecosystem: new obligations for media and tech companies
title.justification: The title directly describes the paper's focus on obligations related to AI content detection.
title.quote: AI content detection in the emerging information ecosystem: new obligations for media and tech companies

extractions.description: The paper discusses the challenges posed by AI-generated content and the importance of developing reliable detection mechanisms. It highlights new regulatory obligations for media and tech companies, especially in light of recent legal directives like the EU AI Act and the US Executive Order on AI. The paper proposes new duties for identifying AI-generated content to ensure social resilience and considers questions of policy concerning the deployment and regulation of these detection tools.

type.justification: The paper discusses policy initiatives and legal requirements, highlighting real-world obligations for companies, which indicates an empirical study of existing regulations and practices.
type.quote: Our paper considers what new options there are for policymakers in this new, dynamic context.

name.justification: The paper primarily deals with the detection of AI-generated content and the implications for media and tech companies.
name.quote: AI content detection in the emerging information ecosystem: new obligations for media and tech companies

name.justification: The paper discusses legal frameworks like the EU AI Act to control AI-generated content.
name.quote: These new obligations arise mainly from the EU’s newly finalised AI Act.

name.justification: The paper explores various types of AI-generated content and the challenges they pose.
name.quote: The world is about to be swamped by an unprecedented wave of AI-generated content.

name.justification: The paper mentions GPT-4 as an example of an AI text generation system.
name.quote: AI text gen-eration systems such as GPT-4 (OpenAI, 2023)

is_contributed.justification: GPT-4 is used as a reference example in the discussion, not a contribution of the paper.
is_contributed.quote: AI text gen-eration systems such as GPT-4 (OpenAI, 2023)

is_executed.justification: The paper does not involve executing the model but discusses it conceptually.

is_compared.justification: The paper does not numerically compare GPT-4 against other models.

referenced_paper_title.justification: Provides context for the discussed model.
referenced_paper_title.quote: OpenAI. (2023). GPT-4: Scaling up deep learning.

name.justification: Gemini is listed as another AI text generation system.

is_contributed.justification: Gemini is referenced rather than contributed by the paper.

is_executed.justification: Discussion about Gemini is theoretical, not based on execution.

is_compared.justification: Gemini is not compared to other models in a numerical study.

referenced_paper_title.value: Gemini 1.5: Unlocking multimodal understanding across millions of tokens of context
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced title indicates the discussed model.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Google (2024). Gemini 1.5: Unlocking multimodal understanding across millions of tokens of context.

name.justification: DALL-E is included in the context of AI image generation systems.
name.quote: AI image generation systems such as Dall-E (OpenAI, 2021)

is_contributed.justification: The paper references DALL-E as an existing model.
is_contributed.quote: AI image generation systems such as Dall-E (OpenAI, 2021)

is_executed.justification: There is no execution of DALL-E within the study.

is_compared.justification: DALL-E is not subject to comparative analysis in the paper.

referenced_paper_title.justification: This title gives insight into the referenced work.
referenced_paper_title.quote: OpenAI (2021). DALL·E: creating images from text.

name.justification: Midjourney is cited as an example of an AI image generation system.
name.quote: AI image generation systems such as Midjourney (Midjourney, Inc., 2022)

is_contributed.justification: Not a contribution by the authors but a referenced existing model.
is_contributed.quote: AI image generation systems such as Midjourney (Midjourney, Inc., 2022)

is_executed.justification: Midjourney is discussed conceptually, without execution details.

is_compared.justification: The model Midjourney is not numerically compared to others in the paper.

referenced_paper_title.justification: Refers to the same title as noted in the paper.
referenced_paper_title.quote: AI image generation systems such as Midjourney (Midjourney, Inc., 2022)

name.justification: Falcon is mentioned alongside other AI text generation systems.

is_contributed.justification: Falcon is referenced as an existing model.

is_executed.justification: The paper does not execute the Falcon model.

is_compared.justification: Falcon is mentioned without comparative context.

is_executed.justification: The paper does not describe executing Mixtral.
